name: Cops Revenge - Police Car Demolition on Highway ( A Game for Destruction Lovers )
name_original: Cops Revenge - Police Car Demolition on Highway ( A Game for Destruction Lovers )
description:
Cops Revenge - Police Car Demolition on Highway ( A Game for Destruction Lovers )

Get ready for the best Cops Revenge game as you jump into the driver seat of a POLICE car out for REVENGE!

SMASH the Bad Guys on your way Because It’s Time To Show Them Who’s Boss!

Time to get your REVENGE!


- New and Easy Game Play mechanics.
- Tons of Fast and Hot racing police cars to pick n drive.
- Cool Opponent Car Blast Effects.
- Neat and Simple 3d Graphics.
- Game Center LeaderBoard for game competition
- Twitter And Facebook Support.
- Languages Supported English, Arabic, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, Traditional Chinese.
- Supported Apple Device: iPad fourth generation, iPad Mini, iPad second generation, iPad third generation, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPod Touch fifth generation.
